title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2394/94 of 3 October 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1559/94 laying down detailed rules for the application in the poultrymeat and egg sectors of the arrangements provided for in the Interim Agreement between the Community and Bulgaria and Romania and amending Regulation (EC) No 1807/94
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2394/94 of 3 October 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1559/94 laying down detailed rules for the application in the poultrymeat and egg sectors of the arrangements provided for in the Interim Agreement between the  Community and Bulgaria and Romania and amending Regulation (EC) No 1807/94
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 1559/94 is hereby replaced by Annex I to this Regulation.
Annex II to Regulation (EC) No 1807/94 is hereby replaced by Annex II to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
